AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: created
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was created from a bean pit like all of his kind.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bean man
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a freshly birthed bean man. His story has just begun.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bean town dweller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed into a supportive community of fellow bean men. There he cultivated his unique skills to serve his people.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed into a society which considered bean men inferior creatures and used them as slaves. He worked for many years on a plantation before eventually escaping.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: drug dealer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed in a backwater bean pit by a gang of violent criminals who used him to make and sell drugs on the street.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rebel
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a band of rebels fighting against a horrible tyrant. He fought alongside them for many years.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gnome stronghold bean man
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by gnomes. He spent years learning the arts of cooking and farming from them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jeub city bean man
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by jeubs. He spent years 'learning' from them before eventually making the wise choice to leave.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pirate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by a crew of pirates on the high seas. While he was initially forced to do the most menial of tasks on the ships, through hard work he earned the respect of the crew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: chinese
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by a village in China who needed help in their fields. Somehow, he became known as the best calligrapher and scholar in the region despite not having hands. When word of his prowess reached the Emperor, he was allowed to take the Imperial Civil Service Examinations, which he passed with flying colors. He eventually became one of the Emperor's high ministers before being driven to exile in a factional struggle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bean threader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by an eccentric bean threading master in search of a worthy apprentice. He learned many of the man's fascinating bean threading techniques during their time together.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: craftsman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a manufactory crafting all sorts of little objects.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tribesman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by a primitive tribe who must have found a Sapient Bean Matrix lying around or something. He helped the tribe in many ways over the years that he lived with them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cannon fodder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by one of the belligerents in a seemingly eternal war of attrition. His superiors viewed him as expendable and threw him into the thick of all the most brutal battles. Somehow, however, he survived and eventually escaped.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: secret chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed by a novice chef desperate for help with his job. [PAWN_nameDef] came up with the genius idea of hiding under the chef's hat and pulling his hair to secretly control him. This was surprisingly effective, all things considered.
